Articles.Content:
Do you have pics yet?

of the placeholder? no i have to make the engine at the back then yes so maybe in a few hours.

PS just contacted frizzank

PPS also i have things to do today so depending on how tired i am after i will ether work on it or just play KSP.

Edited June 22, 2013 by crasher925
UHHHHGGGG SOOOOO TIRED sry guys...

permissons done!

Frizzank:

the titan was originally part of the Nova Punch pack, so you would also need to ask Tiberion if it was ok with him as well, since I took the fairing s from his pack. But other than that I have no problems with it.

If he says its ok I will see If I can get you a DAE of the models and psd's for the textures if thats ok with you.

Tiberion:

Sure, those files are licenses under the Creative commons license which you can find linked from the Novapunch forum thread, so as long as the authorship info from the config file remains intact (you can add names to indicate edits of course) then its fine.

frizzank updated those parts with new textures, so he should have all the source files you need. I don't have the post-update source files in a handy place, though if he doesn't have them I can dig out the older versions for you.
Good, have you gotten the placeholder in game yet?

nah I haven't been working on it very much recently due to fatigue. (i"m an insomniac!) but i plan to get back into working on it.

AND to wet your appetites!

its just a rough model and by NO means done but thats what i have so far!
more work! staring to really take shape and this is a lot of fun!

I'm glad you're enjoying yourself. I'm not a huge fan of distant-future sci-fi mods, but I might still be alive when the real Phoenix gets built, so I'll probably give this a try. I actually thought about building the Phoenix with existing parts. Can i just make a suggestion? Please break it up into parts. I kind of like the idea of putting extendable nacelles and the cockpit on other ships.

Also will you be modelling the windows or just texturing them?

I'm glad you're enjoying yourself. I'm not a huge fan uof distant-future sci-fi mods, but I might still be alive when the real Phoenix gets built, so I'll probably give this a try. I actually thought about building the Phoenix with existing parts. Can i just make a suggestion? Please break it up into parts. I kind of like the idea of putting extendable nacelles and the cockpit on other ships.

Also will you be modelling the windows or just texturing them?

Yes I will be cuting this up one it is fineshed and I wont stop there ether ill be making multiple classes like cargo, transport,ect what do you mean by modeling them or just texturing them??
I think he means being able to see out of them in IVA? Correct me if I'm wrong.

I think he means being able to see out of them in IVA? Correct me if I'm wrong.

You mean make an IVA in my cocpit?? yes when i learn how.
An Iva that you can click the windows and see out of.

An Iva that you can click the windows and see out of.

Uh yeah!! Of course!!!
you are my second favorite person on the forums, second only to Bobcat.

No I meant exactly what i said. I'm wondering whether he'll intrude the windows into the mesh somehow, because that's probably the most difficult part to model IMO. I've done a bit of blendering. In the movie the windows aren't just flush with the cockpit.

Or will you just keep the mesh smooth and texture the windows.
Oh sorry I guess I Didn't know what you meant.
So like windows so you can see the kerbins then yes if i could fiqure out how to do that

you are my second favorite person on the forums, second only to Bobcat.

W00T but what makes bobcat ur fav???
His great mods and attention to details.
I dont??
I'm not saying that you dont have great attention to detail but his mods are more detailed( by virtue of his experience, He's created dozens of mods)

You Go Dude. Take all ya can, give nothing back. commons license......whatever.

(CM)

You Go Dude. Take all ya can, give nothing back. commons license......whatever.

(CM)

????? What????

????? What????

Yeah... it's not worth the effort to figure it out.

You're making fine progress. Keep up the good work!

????? What????

Was saying, you go! Make what ya want! KIT BASH TO THE MAX! I Support that idea 100%. That's all.

Was saying, you go! Make what ya want! KIT BASH TO THE MAX! I Support that idea 100%. That's all.

great glad to see ppl finaly warming up to the idea!!!!!
